description: Junior Stellano and Spencer Reed are enjoying the dog days of summer, making out on the grass of the Christopher Street Pier and then cooling off in the outdoor showers. But standing in tight speedos with their chiseled bodies writhing against each other, dripping wet… things get too hard to resist. The two sex studs strip down in a near by Chelsea apartment and start their fuck frenzy!
title: Spencer Reed and Junior Stellano
